extendedInfo.description: Air Wings is a flying battle game where you pilot a paper airplane and shoot your network opponent using crazy weaponry such as the spit wads, rubber-bands, heat seeking pencils, firecracker bombs, and suction cup darts. The game is incredibly fun as you fly around trying to gather as much weaponry as possible while avoiding the fire from your opponents. There are 7 different planes to choose from including a totally cool balsa airplane with a rubber-band powered propeller. There are 7 different Multiplayer Battle Levels plus a single-player Training Level. - Online Multiplayer Battles.- PlayPhone Integrated- Facebook Integration

reviews.title: Freezes or refuses to join games
reviews.comment: Game is good but eats the battery even when not running. Also crashes or freezes often and refuses to find an opponent often if not force closed and cache cleared every other game
reviews.author: John Spence

reviews.title: Great game but super buggy
reviews.comment: Game constantly crashes and is ultra buggy on galaxy note 2. Great game, when it works. Kinda upset I spent money on upgrades :(
reviews.author: TC Kral

reviews.title: Play phone sucks
reviews.comment: Wow, this game is awesome on iOS but since the android version needs playphone it doesn\'t work. Not sure why it would be associated with such a terrible service.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Laggy
reviews.comment: Would be great but so laggy on Android. Played it on ios and works perfect. Please fix them I\'ll change my rating lol
reviews.author: Vanaro Chan

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: Fun game, but it takes too long to find a multi-player match.  I would like to have a campaign that I could play and while I am playing have indicator that lets me know a multi-player match is available.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NEED UPDATES!!!!
reviews.comment: Great game but on Android it doesn\'t come close to iOS version.  There hasn\'t been a new level or plane pack forever.  At least switch the training level to battle - shouldn\'t be much work.  Add something new!

reviews.title: Cant rate yet
reviews.comment: The game seems good but never found a match .so   ...working on this issue must get the priority
reviews.author: Fahad Alharbi

reviews.title: Good game but battle problem
reviews.comment: I would give five stars for this game. I\'m lovin it! However, i gave you 3 stars overall because it asked me to connect facebook which means this games only can be used by a facebook user (I dont want to register facebook). If u can fix this, I bet this game will be much better, you will receive 5 stars & beautiful comments not just from me. Thank you :)

reviews.title: Really good game!! (Galaxy S3)
reviews.comment: Only ine problem.. it doesn\'t work with my facebook friends. . I can not serach for my contacts or log in with my facebook.. so I only play on training mode... need to fix this please!!!!

reviews.title: Fun!

reviews.title: Coocoo CarAcha!
reviews.comment: This app is horrible, it took like, One whole hour just to download, then it made my whole HTC Evo 4G Glitch!!!! I was like, OMG!!!!!
reviews.author: Tristen James

reviews.title: Better download this on iOS
reviews.comment: Don\'t download it in android. It re-downloads the terrain files and if your device has a problem, the plane will actually turn left or right even you set it as the neutral position. I tried this on my older iPad and it works perfectly. At iPad, you can also multiplayer without a Facebook because the Playphone needs Facebook. I want to give this game 5 stars in iOS version.

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait to play the game.

reviews.title: Training gets boring
